div.div: Fluctuations in wing pointedness (Kipp) of eleven bird species in southern Germany between 1889 and 2010.
div.p: Solid line – regression spline fit from the GAM; dashed lines – 95% confidence intervals. See methods for details. A p-value of >0.05 is indicated with (ns) after the species name, see table 2 for exact p-values.
